enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: TUVALU stressed the need to educate all sections of society, including government ministries, on climate change.
The EU and JAPAN stressed country-driven approaches to capacity building.
TANZANIA, for the G-77/China, said institutional capacity building had not yet been addressed.
Chair Stoycheva said Dechen Tsering (Bhutan) would chair a contact group on the issue.
